Text:
Extras include:

    Nth Korean prisoner executions
    Marilyn Monroe in Korea
    Exclusive Soldier Home Movies from the Front
    Timeline Feature with Bonus Newsreels
    Gun Camera Compilation
    The Korean War Veterans' Memeorial
    Video Biographies of Truman, MacArthur and Eisenhower
    Inique Photo Slide Show
    Interactive Full Motion Menus
    Never-before-seen Declassified Footage
    And More
One main file and 19 unnamed "extras"? What are the extra files specifically? Thanks.
By the way, the main file is quite good. It is informative, well laid out with good supporting graphics, and is honest and fair in its point of view about what happened.

@ Vikingman

1st comment on this torrent has the descriptions.
If you have already d/l it then you can rename them yourself.
